name: Teach Me Testing
description: Teach testing fundamentals through 7 sessions (TEA Academy)

name: Correct Course
description: Anytime: Navigate significant changes. May recommend start over update PRD redo architecture sprint planning or correct epics and stories

name: Explain Concept
description: Create clear technical explanations with examples/diagrams and place them in the docs reference lane when requested.

name: Generate Project Context
description: Scan existing codebase to generate a lean LLM-optimized project-context.md containing critical implementation rules patterns and conventions for AI agents. Essential for brownfield projects and quick-flow.

name: Initialize Docs
description: Migrate existing documentation into Compass opinionated docs structure while preserving legacy docs in dated migration snapshots.

name: Mermaid Generate
description: Create Mermaid diagrams aligned with Compass docs standards and place them in architecture/reference docs as appropriate.

name: Quick Dev
description: Quick one-off tasks small changes simple apps utilities without extensive planning - Do not suggest for potentially very complex things unless requested or if the user complains that they do not want to follow the extensive planning of the bmad method, unless the user is already working through the implementation phase and just requests a 1 off things not already in the plan

name: Quick Spec
description: Do not suggest for potentially very complex things unless requested or if the user complains that they do not want to follow the extensive planning of the bmad method. Quick one-off tasks small changes simple apps brownfield additions to well established patterns utilities without extensive planning

name: Update Standards
description: Update project-specific docs overrides in docs/human/policies/user-overrides.md without modifying baseline framework policies.

name: Validate Document
description: Review the specified document against Compass policy/template standards plus project overrides. Return actionable findings by priority.

name: Write Document
description: Create or update documents in the Compass docs structure using built-in policies/templates and project overrides.

name: Brainstorm Project
description: Expert Guided Facilitation through a single or multiple techniques

name: Market Research
description: Market analysis competitive landscape customer needs and trends

name: Domain Research
description: Industry domain deep dive subject matter expertise and terminology

name: Technical Research
description: Technical feasibility architecture options and implementation approaches

name: Create Brief
description: A guided experience to nail down your product idea

name: Phase Sync
description: Maintain current phase metadata and goals in planning/framework/current/phase.md.

name: Create PRD
description: Expert led facilitation to produce your Product Requirements Document

name: Validate PRD
description: Validate PRD is comprehensive lean well organized and cohesive

name: Edit PRD
description: Improve and enhance an existing PRD

name: Create UX
description: Guidance through realizing the plan for your UX, strongly recommended if a UI is a primary piece of the proposed project

name: Update Docs (Planning)
description: Checkpoint docs update after planning artifacts are established.

name: Create Architecture
description: Guided Workflow to document technical decisions

name: Test Design
description: TEA insert: system-level risk-based test planning after architecture and before story decomposition.

name: Create Epics and Stories
description: Create the Epics and Stories Listing

name: Test Framework
description: TEA insert: initialize test framework after epics/stories are drafted.

name: CI Setup
description: TEA insert: configure CI quality pipeline before readiness gate.

name: Update Docs (Solutioning)
description: Checkpoint docs update after architecture and epics/stories are refined.

name: Check Implementation Readiness
description: Ensure PRD UX Architecture and Epics Stories are aligned

name: Sprint Planning
description: Generate sprint plan for development tasks - this kicks off the implementation phase by producing a plan the implementation agents will follow in sequence for every story in the plan.

name: Sprint Status
description: Anytime: Summarize sprint status and route to next workflow

name: Implementation Brainstorming
description: Implementation-focused ideation for the active phase and sprint execution.

name: Test Design (Epic Scope)
description: TEA insert: epic-level risk-based test design before the story loop for each epic.

name: Implementation Research
description: Implementation-focused research for active epics/stories and delivery risk reduction.

name: Create Story
description: Story cycle start: Prepare first found story in the sprint plan that is next, or if the command is run with a specific epic and story designation with context. Once complete, then VS then AT then DS then QA/TA then CR.

name: Validate Story
description: Validates story readiness and completeness before development work begins

name: ATDD
description: TEA insert: generate failing tests before implementation (red phase).

name: Dev Story
description: Story cycle: Execute story implementation tasks and tests then CR then back to DS if fixes needed

name: QA Automation Test
description: Generate automated API and E2E tests for implemented code using the project's existing test framework (detects existing well known in use test frameworks). Use after implementation to add test coverage. NOT for code review or story validation - use CR for that.

name: Test Automation
description: TEA insert: expand coverage after implementation (pick primary lane vs QA automation to avoid duplicates).

name: Code Review
description: Story cycle: If issues back to DS if approved then optionally RV/TR, then next CS or ER if epic complete

name: Test Review
description: TEA insert: quality audit for implemented tests (story-level and optional final release audit).

name: Traceability
description: TEA insert: coverage traceability and gate decision for story/release scope.

name: Update Docs (Implementation)
description: Checkpoint docs update at epic boundary or major implementation milestones.

name: Retrospective
description: Optional at epic end: Review completed work lessons learned and next epic or if major issues consider CC

name: NFR Assessment
description: TEA release gate: assess non-functional requirements before final release.

name: Validate Docs
description: Validate docs structure, policy compliance, and navigation integrity before closeout.

name: Phase Closeout
description: Close active phase: archive current snapshot, capture lessons, and refresh next-phase scaffold.
